tool_description: Assesses fire protection systems including detection, suppression, and alarm systems effectiveness.

sprinkler_system_type.description: Type of sprinkler system (wet, dry, preaction, deluge, none)

system_monitoring.description: Type of system monitoring (local, central station, proprietary, none)

last_inspection_date.description: Date of last fire protection system inspection

water_supply_adequacy.description: Water supply adequacy for fire protection (adequate, marginal, inadequate)

error_messages: Invalid sprinkler type: Use wet, dry, preaction, deluge, or none.
Extinguisher count error: Number must be non-negative integer.
Invalid monitoring type: Use local, central station, proprietary, or none.
Inspection date format error: Use ISO 8601 date-time format.
Invalid water supply rating: Use adequate, marginal, or inadequate.
usage: Specify presence of basic fire protection systems (smoke_detectors_present, sprinkler_system_type, fire_alarm_system, emergency_lighting, exit_signs) and portable_extinguishers count. Include optional parameters for comprehensive evaluation.

system_deficiencies.description: Identified deficiencies in fire protection systems

compliance_gaps.description: Areas where fire protection doesn't meet current codes
